alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Suffolk; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 05 at 2:08PM EST until January 07 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible during the Friday morning commute. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches possible. * WHERE...Rhode Island and eastern Massachusetts, including the Interstate 95 Boston to Providence corridor. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Be prepared for difficult travel during the Friday morning commute. Heavy snow may create poor visibility and slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of around 1 inch per hour are possible during the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
